message.entry: Input must be a character vector expression, function name, function handle, or INLINE object.
{0} cannot be plotted in the xy-plane.
Cannot plot parameterized surfaces. Try ezsurf.
The input character vector must be an expression. Implicit functions of a single variable are not supported.
Cannot plot {0}: This function has no real values.
Function failed to evaluate on array inputs; vectorizing the function may speed up its evaluation and avoid the need to loop over array elements.
